resources.string: An Email will be sent with instructions on how to set up your new password.
Password should have a capital letter and number.

I am an experienced mobile developer with a strong track record in android app development. Over three years, I have honed my skills in coding, UI/UX design and performance optimization. I am dedicated to creating user-centric, visually appealing and high performance mobile apps. My expertise in Kotlin and Java, coupled with commitment to staying updated with industry trends, allows me to deliver top-notch solutions. I thrive in collaborative environment and consistently meet project goals on time.

Successfully delivered Android projects for clients across various industries. Praised for excellent communication skills, prompt responses and ability to transform complex requirements into functional and intuitive mobile applications.
Collaborated with senior developers to implement core features to apps. Where i conducted extensive testing and bug fixing to improve app stability.
Conduct code reviews, collaborate with cross functional teams and conducting extensive testing and bug fixing.
Went through six months training in software engineering including capstone projects conducted monthly.
Went through comprehensive learning of computer science concepts together with mathematical experience.
